verses.verse: אַשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> ALEPH Blessed תְמִֽימֵי־ <WH8549> [are] the undefiled דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way הַֽ֝הֹלְכִ֗ים <WH1980> who walk בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed נֹצְרֵ֥י <WH5341> [are] they that keep עֵדֹתָ֗יו <WH5713> his testimonies בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵ֥ב <WH3820> him with the whole heart יִדְרְשֽׁוּהוּ׃ <WH1875> [and that] seek
אַ֭ף <WH637> also לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no פָעֲל֣וּ <WH6466> They also do עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> no iniquity בִּדְרָכָ֥יו <WH1870> in his ways הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> they walk
אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You צִוִּ֥יתָה <WH6680> Thou hast commanded פִקֻּדֶ֗יךָ <WH6490> thy precepts לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> [us] to keep מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> diligently
אַ֭חֲלַי <WH305> O that יִכֹּ֥נוּ <WH3559> were directed דְרָכָ֗י <WH1870> my ways לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> to keep חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2706> thy statutes

אָ֥ז <WH227> Then לֹא־ <WH3808> not אֵב֑וֹשׁ <WH954> Then shall I not be ashamed בְּ֝הַבִּיטִ֗י <WH5027> when I have respect אֶל־ <WH413> upon כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> unto all thy commandments

א֭וֹדְךָ <WH3034> I will praise בְּיֹ֣שֶׁר <WH3476> thee with uprightness לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> of heart בְּ֝לָמְדִ֗י <WH3925> when I shall have learned מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י <WH4941> judgments צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ <WH6664> thy righteous
אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֶּ֥יךָ <WH2706> thy statutes אֶשְׁמֹ֑ר <WH8104> I will keep אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעַזְבֵ֥נִי <WH5800> O forsake עַד־ <WH5704> not מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me not utterly

בַּמֶּ֣ה <WH4100> How יְזַכֶּה־ <WH2135> cleanse נַּ֭עַר <WH5288> BETH Wherewithal shall a young man אֶת־ <WH853> אָרְח֑וֹ <WH734> his way לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> beward כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> [thereto] according to thy word

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבִּ֥י <WH3820> With my whole heart דְרַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <WH1875> have I sought אַל־ <WH408> not תַּ֝שְׁגֵּ֗נִי <WH7686> thee O let me not wander מִמִּצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> from thy commandments
בְּ֭לִבִּי <WH3820> in mine heart צָפַ֣נְתִּי <WH6845> have I hid אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH565> Thy word לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> because of לֹ֣א <WH3808> may not אֶֽחֱטָא־ <WH2398> that I might not sin לָֽךְ׃
בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God לַמְּדֵ֥נִי <WH3925> teach חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2706> me thy statutes
בִּשְׂפָתַ֥י <WH8193> With my lips סִפַּ֑רְתִּי <WH5608> have I declared כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> of All מִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> all the judgments פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth
בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way עֵדְוֹתֶ֥יךָ <WH5715> of thy testimonies שַׂ֗שְׂתִּי <WH7797> I have rejoiced כְּעַ֣ל <WH5921> as [much as] in כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֽוֹן׃ <WH1952> all riches
בְּפִקֻּדֶ֥יךָ <WH6490> in thy precepts אָשִׂ֑יחָה <WH7878> I will meditate וְ֝אַבִּ֗יטָה <WH5027> and have respect אֹרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH734> unto thy ways
בְּחֻקֹּתֶ֥יךָ <WH2708> myself in thy statutes אֶֽשְׁתַּעֲשָׁ֑ע <WH8173> I will delight לֹ֭א <WH3808> shall not אֶשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> I will not forget דְּבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> thy word
גְּמֹ֖ל <WH1580> GIMEL Deal bountifully עַֽל־ <WH5921> with עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> with thy servant אֶֽחְיֶ֗ה <WH2421> [that] I may live וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <WH8104> and keep דְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> thy word
גַּל־ <WH1540> Open עֵינַ֥י <WH5869> thou mine eyes וְאַבִּ֑יטָה <WH5027> that I may behold נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת <WH6381> wondrous things מִתּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8451> out of thy law
גֵּ֣ר <WH1616> I [am] a stranger אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> in בָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth אַל־ <WH408> not תַּסְתֵּ֥ר <WH5641> hide מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <WH4480> at מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> not thy commandments

גָּרְסָ֣ה <WH1638> breaketh נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> My soul לְתַאֲבָ֑ה <WH8375> for the longing אֶֽל־ <WH413> After מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ <WH4941> [that it hath] unto thy judgments בְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> at all times
גָּ֭עַרְתָּ <WH1605> Thou hast rebuked זֵדִ֣ים <WH2086> the proud אֲרוּרִ֑ים <WH779> [that are] cursed הַ֝שֹּׁגִים <WH7686> which do err מִמִּצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> from thy commandments

גַּ֣ל <WH1556> Remove מֵֽ֭עָלַי <WH5921> and חֶרְפָּ֣ה <WH2781> from me reproach וָב֑וּז <WH937> and contempt כִּ֖י <WH3588> for עֵדֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH5713> thy testimonies נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH5341> for I have kept

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Even יָֽשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> also did sit שָׂ֭רִים <WH8269> Princes בִּ֣י נִדְבָּ֑רוּ <WH1696> [and] speak עַ֝בְדְּךָ֗ <WH5650> against me [but] thy servant יָשִׂ֥יחַ <WH7878> did meditate בְּחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2706> in thy statutes
גַּֽם־ <WH1571> also עֵ֭דֹתֶיךָ <WH5713> Thy testimonies שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֗י <WH8191> also [are] my delight אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> another עֲצָתִֽי׃ <WH6098> advice
דָּֽבְקָ֣ה <WH1692> cleaveth לֶעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> unto the dust נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> DALETH My soul חַ֝יֵּ֗נִי <WH2421> quicken כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> thou me according to thy word
דְּרָכַ֣י <WH1870> my ways סִ֭פַּרְתִּי <WH5608> I have declared וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֗נִי <WH6030> and thou heardest לַמְּדֵ֥נִי <WH3925> me teach חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2706> me thy statutes
דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> the way פִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ <WH6490> of thy precepts הֲבִינֵ֑נִי <WH995> Make me to understand וְ֝אָשִׂ֗יחָה <WH7878> so shall I talk בְּנִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> of thy wondrous works
דָּלְפָ֣ה <WH1811> melteth נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> My soul מִתּוּגָ֑ה <WH8424> for heaviness קַ֝יְּמֵ֗נִי <WH6965> strengthen כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> thou me according unto thy word
דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> from me the way שֶׁ֭קֶר <WH8267> of lying הָסֵ֣ר <WH5493> Remove מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ <WH8451> and grant me thy law חָנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2603> graciously
דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> the way אֱמוּנָ֥ה <WH530> of truth בָחָ֑רְתִּי <WH977> I have chosen מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ <WH4941> thy judgments שִׁוִּֽיתִי׃ <WH7737> have I laid
דָּבַ֥קְתִּי <WH1692> I have stuck בְעֵֽדְוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH5715> unto thy testimonies יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God אַל־ <WH408> not תְּבִישֵֽׁנִי׃ <WH954> put me not to shame
דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> the way מִצְוֹתֶ֥יךָ <WH4687> of thy commandments אָר֑וּץ <WH7323> I will run כִּ֖י <WH3588> for תַרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> when thou shalt enlarge לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> my heart
הוֹרֵ֣נִי <WH3384> HE Teach יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way חֻקֶּ֗יךָ <WH2706> of thy statutes וְאֶצְּרֶ֥נָּה <WH5341> and I shall keep עֵֽקֶב׃ <WH6118> it [unto] the end

הֲ֭בִינֵנִי <WH995> Give me understanding וְאֶצְּרָ֥ה <WH5341> and I shall keep תֽוֹרָתֶ֗ךָ <WH8451> thy law וְאֶשְׁמְרֶ֥נָּה <WH8104> yea I shall observe בְכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> it with [my] whole heart
הַ֭דְרִיכֵנִי <WH1869> Make me to go בִּנְתִ֣יב <WH5410> in the path מִצְוֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH4687> of thy commandments כִּי־ <WH3588> for ב֥וֹ חָפָֽצְתִּי׃ <WH2654> for therein do I delight
הַט־ <WH5186> Incline לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> my heart אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵדְוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH5715> unto thy testimonies וְאַ֣ל <WH408> nay אֶל־ <WH413> and בָּֽצַע׃ <WH1215> and not to covetousness
הַעֲבֵ֣ר <WH5674> Turn away עֵ֭ינַי <WH5869> mine eyes מֵרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> from beholding שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> vanity בִּדְרָכֶ֥ךָ <WH1870> thou me in thy way חַיֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2421> [and] quicken
הָקֵ֣ם <WH6965> Stablish לְ֭עַבְדְּךָ <WH5650> unto thy servant אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH565> thy word אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר <WH834> which לְיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3374> who [is devoted] to thy fear

הַעֲבֵ֣ר <WH5674> Turn away חֶ֭רְפָּתִי <WH2781> my reproach אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יָגֹ֑רְתִּי <WH3025> which I fear כִּ֖י <WH3588> For מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <WH4941> for thy judgments טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> [are] good
הִ֭נֵּה <WH2009> Behold תָּאַ֣בְתִּי <WH8373> Behold I have longed לְפִקֻּדֶ֑יךָ <WH6490> after thy precepts בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> me in thy righteousness חַיֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2421> quicken
וִֽיבֹאֻ֣נִי <WH935> come חֲסָדֶ֣ךָ <WH2617> VAU Let thy mercies יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God תְּ֝שֽׁוּעָתְךָ֗ <WH8668> [even] thy salvation כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH565> according to thy word

וְאֶֽעֱנֶ֣ה <WH6030> to answer חֹרְפִ֣י <WH2778> him that reproacheth דָבָ֑ר <WH1697> So shall I have wherewith כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָ֝טַחְתִּי <WH982> me for I trust בִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> in thy word

וְֽאַל־ <WH408> not תַּצֵּ֬ל <WH5337> And take מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> out of my mouth דְבַר־ <WH1697> not the word אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> of truth עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> utterly כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְמִשְׁפָּטֶ֣ךָ <WH4941> in thy judgments יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH3176> for I have hoped
וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֖ה <WH8104> So shall I keep תוֹרָתְךָ֥ <WH8451> thy law תָמִ֗יד <WH8548> continually לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever
וְאֶתְהַלְּכָ֥ה <WH1980> And I will walk בָרְחָבָ֑ה <WH7342> at liberty כִּ֖י <WH3588> for פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ <WH6490> thy precepts דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃ <WH1875> for I seek
וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <WH1696> I will speak בְ֭עֵדֹתֶיךָ <WH5713> of thy testimonies נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before מְלָכִ֗ים <WH4428> also before kings וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH954> and will not be ashamed
וְאֶשְׁתַּֽעֲשַׁ֥ע <WH8173> And I will delight בְּמִצְוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4687> myself in thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which אָהָֽבְתִּי׃ <WH157> which I have loved

וְאֶשָּֽׂא־ <WH5375> also will I lift up כַפַּ֗י <WH3709> My hands אֶֽל־ <WH413> to מִ֭צְוֹתֶיךָ <WH4687> unto thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which אָהָ֗בְתִּי <WH157> which I have loved וְאָשִׂ֥יחָה <WH7878> and I will meditate בְחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2706> in thy statutes
זְכֹר־ <WH2142> ZAIN Remember דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> the word לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> unto thy servant עַ֝֗ל <WH5921> In אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִֽחַלְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH3176> upon which thou hast caused me to hope
זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise נֶחָמָתִ֣י <WH5165> This [is] my comfort בְעָנְיִ֑י <WH6040> in my affliction כִּ֖י <WH3588> That אִמְרָתְךָ֣ <WH565> for thy word חִיָּֽתְנִי׃ <WH2421> hath quickened

זֵ֭דִים <WH2086> The proud הֱלִיצֻ֣נִי <WH3887> in derision עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> have had me greatly מִ֝תּֽוֹרָתְךָ֗ <WH8451> from thy law לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נָטִֽיתִי׃ <WH5186> [yet] have I not declined
זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <WH2142> I remembered מִשְׁפָּטֶ֖יךָ <WH4941> thy judgments מֵעוֹלָ֥ם ׀ <WH5769> of old יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וָֽאֶתְנֶחָֽם׃ <WH5162> and have comforted
זַלְעָפָ֣ה <WH2152> Horror אֲ֭חָזַתְנִי <WH270> hath taken hold מֵרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> upon me because of the wicked עֹ֝זְבֵ֗י <WH5800> that forsake תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8451> thy law
זְ֭מִרוֹת <WH2158> have been my songs הָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֥י חֻקֶּ֗יךָ <WH2706> Thy statutes בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house מְגוּרָֽי׃ <WH4033> of my pilgrimage
זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <WH2142> I have remembered בַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> in the night שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> thy name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וָֽ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה <WH8104> and have kept תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8451> thy law
זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> has become לִּ֑י כִּ֖י <WH3588> for פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ <WH6490> thy precepts נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH5341> This I had because I kept
חֶלְקִ֖י <WH2506> CHETH [Thou art] my portion יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I have said לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> that I would keep דְּבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1697> thy words

חִלִּ֣יתִי <WH2470> I intreated פָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> thy favour בְכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵ֑ב <WH3820> with [my] whole heart חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> be merciful כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH565> unto me according to thy word
